'''Mist Flower Corolla''' is a [[Material]] found all over [[Teyvat]].

==How to Obtain==
Mist Flower Corollas grow as [[Mist Flower]]s, which are commonly found near bodies of water. Using a [[Pyro]] skill on a Mist Flower will make it harvestable.

See the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=61 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.

==Descriptions==
{{Description|A flower bud encased in solid ice. Even after being picked the flower continues to emit cold. A [[The Fox in the Dandelion Sea|popular work of fiction]] tells of a [[foxes|fox]] becoming trapped in ice from a Mist Flower and being unable to extricate itself. For small creatures with limited strength, it is a very dangerous plant indeed.}}

==Trivia==
* {{Mail Attachments by Category List}}
* Mist Flower Corolla is also used to make the Elemental Bait in [[Diluc]] and [[Mona]]'s [[Story Quest]]s.
